item.title: 0871 MP
item.description: score:871 Chances: MP Materials beat analysts’ top- and bottom-line expectations in Q2 2023, indicating strong financial performance. The company reported refining small amounts of rare earths in California, a milestone that bodes well for its future. Shares of MP Materials rose by 5.
